attributes.action: Look at US fuel prices, and lower fuel tax in line with some kind of normality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel in America is 50% of the price in the UK.
The UK has the 4th highest amount of fuel tax in Europe. 

This is a plea from everyone who uses our roads, and makes our country tick, to reduce the cost of fuel, and to stop forcing tax paying citizens OUT of their cars. 

Fuel has risen 20p per litre inside a year, and to a lot of people, even the running costs of a diesel vehicle are out of budget!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
